bean.p:render: @{((dataObject.backupList ne null and dataObject.backupList.size() gt 0) or (dataObject.plannedList ne null and dataObject.plannedList.size() gt 0) or (dataObject.academicTerms ne null and dataObject.academicTerms.size() gt 0)) ? true : false}

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:render: @{dataObject.savedItemId ne null and dataObject.plannedList ne null and dataObject.plannedList.size() eq 0 and dataObject.backupList ne null and dataObject.backupList.size() eq 0 and dataObject.academicTerms ne null and dataObject.academicTerms.size() eq 0 ? true : false}

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.courseDescription ne null and dataObject.courseDescription.length() gt 0 ? true : false}

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.courseDescription ne null and dataObject.courseDescription.length() gt 0 ? false : true}

bean.p:messageText: Not offered for more than 10 years.
May not be eligible for Financial Aid

bean.p:render: @{#line.gradingOption eq null AND !#line.distanceLearning AND !#line.honorsSection AND !#line.jointOffering AND !#line.research AND !#line.writingSection AND !#line.serviceLearning AND !#line.newThisYear AND !#line.ineligibleForFinancialAid}
